# Release v5.3.4

## Installation

Download the latest release from [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/releases).

## Changes

### New Features

- **Configurable Playback Rate**: Read Aloud and Prompt & Read now support an adjustable playback speed so you can listen faster or slower.

### Fixes

- **Audio Processing Stability**: Fixed a crash when connecting the audio pitch unit by using Float32 format for `AVAudioUnitTimePitch`.

### Other

- **Screenshots**: Updated screenshot capture tooling and assets for documentation.

## Full Changelog

For a complete list of changes, see the [full changelog](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/compare/v5.3.3...v5.3.4).
